content:
For FPS gaming, accuracy and customization are crucial. Here are my suggestions for gaming mice that have precision and customizable features:

1. Razer DeathAdder Elite: This gaming mouse is built for precision and has advanced optical sensors that provide accurate tracking. It features Razer's Synapse software that allows for custom button mapping, RGB lighting, and sensitivity adjustments.

2. Logitech G502 HERO: The Logitech G502 HERO has a highly precise optical sensor and customizable RGB lighting. It also features Logitech's G HUB software that enables personalized macros, programmable buttons, and DPI settings.

3. Corsair Dark Core RGB/SE: The Corsair Dark Core RGB gaming mouse has a high-precision optical sensor and customizable RGB lighting. It also features wireless and wired connectivity and Corsair's Utility Engine software that provides macro programming and button mapping.

4. SteelSeries Rival 600: This gaming mouse features a TrueMove3+ optical sensor that provides precise tracking and customizable settings through SteelSeries' Engine software. It also has customizable weight and balance options that allow for personalized adjustments.

All of these gaming mice options offer precision and customizability for your FPS gaming needs, and I recommend checking which one best fits your playstyle and needs based on features and reviews.
